text: Wakhi is an eastern Iranic language spoken in northern Pakistan, northern Afghanistan and southwestern China. It belongs to the northeastern subgrouping of the Eastern Iranic languages. ==Related pages== *Languages of Pakistan *Languages of Afghanistan *Languages of China ==References== Category:Iranian languages Category:Pamiri languages Category:Languages of Gilgit-Baltistan Category:Languages of Afghanistan Category:Languages of Tajikistan Category:Languages of China
title: Wakhi language
